it.polito.dp2.BIB

Interface IssueReader


  • public interface IssueReader
    An interface for reading information about a journal issue in the BIB system.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<ArticleReader> getArticles()
      Gets readers for all the articles that belong to this issue and that are available in the BIB system.
      JournalReader getJournal()
      Gets a reader for the journal this issue belongs to
      int getNumber()
      Gets the number of this issue
      int getYear()
      Gets the year of this issue

    • Method Detail

      • getJournal

        JournalReader getJournal()
        Gets a reader for the journal this issue belongs to
        Returns:
        an interface for reading the journal information

      • getYear

        int getYear()
        Gets the year of this issue
        Returns:
        the issue publication year (a positive integer)

      • getNumber

        int getNumber()
        Gets the number of this issue
        Returns:
        the issue number (a positive integer)

      • getArticles

        java.util.Set<ArticleReader> getArticles()
        Gets readers for all the articles that belong to this issue and that are available in the BIB system.
        Returns:
        a set of interfaces for reading the selected articles
